pageContext.description: Dimensions: “max. d. 25.5; max B. (three bands) 14.5  B. band 4.0-5.0; T band 2.2-2.8” , Typology: sl. staggered spiral, causing oblique bands rel. to axis band narrowing a little close to one broken end – poss. little lost; sub-rect. band sec. - mainly flattened sides with rounded corners, Condition: both ends with broken sur. – dark brown – pos. anc. , Attached Material: yellow-brown soil adhering to inside, Labels/Markings: black ink: ‘57/348’,

pageContext.remarks: Surface: mottled olive-emerald green p.; patches broken by speckled pocking or flaking, exposing light green + orange dirty sur, or dark brown […] sur.
